tasks.label: üî® Clean All
args: Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item CMakeUserPresets.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '‚úÖ Cleaned build directory' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: üì¶ Install Dependencies (MSVC)
args: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && if not exist ${workspaceFolder}\build mkdir ${workspaceFolder}\build && cd /d ${workspaceFolder}\build && conan install .. --output-folder=. --build=missing -pr msvc

tasks.label: ‚öôÔ∏è Configure (MSVC)
args: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cd /d ${workspaceFolder} && cmake --preset conan-release -DBUILD_TESTS=ON

tasks.label: üèóÔ∏è Build (MSVC)
args: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cd /d ${workspaceFolder} && cmake --build build\build\Release --parallel 16

tasks.label: üß™ Run Tests
args: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cd /d ${workspaceFolder} && ctest --test-dir build\build\Release --output-on-failure -j16

tasks.label: üé® Format Code (clang-format)
args: Get-ChildItem -Path src,include -Include *.cpp,*.hpp -Recurse | ForEach-Object { clang-format -i $_.FullName; Write-Host "Formatted: $($_.Name)" -ForegroundColor Cyan }

tasks.label: Build DLL
args: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cmake --build build\build\Release --target filevault_dll --parallel 16

tasks.label: Rebuild CLI
args: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cd /d D:\code\filevault && cmake --build build\build\Release --target filevault --parallel 16
